name: Higher or Black
description:
A card game in which the goal is to correctly predict the next card. If the player fails to do so, they are punished and must try again.

The rules of this game are quite simple.

One player starts by guessing whether the next card will be higher or black. If the player fails to make a correct prediction, they are punished (e.g., take a sip of a drink) and must try again.
This continues until the player makes a correct prediction. Once the player has guessed the correct card, they get to choose who will guess the next card.

Special rules can be found in the game, so there's no need to memorize them separately.

If the deck is empty and players want to continue playing, they can shuffle the cards again.
